```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)

data("stop_words")

jasa_articles = read_csv("./jasa_articles_dataset_complete.csv") %>%
  clean_names() %>% 
  separate(authors, into = c("author1", "author19"), sep = " & ") %>% 
  separate(author1, into = paste("author", 1:18), sep = ", ") %>% 
  unnest_tokens(word, title)

jasa_articles = anti_join(jasa_articles, stop_words)

word = c("analysis", "bayesian", "data", "estimation", "inference", "model", "nonparametric", "regression", "statistics")
keywords = as.data.frame(word)

keywords = semi_join(jasa_articles, keywords)

# keywords over time
keywords %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  count(word) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, word, fill = word)) + 
  geom_density_ridges()



```
